name: Customer 360 Stack
author: Microsoft AI Customer Intelligence Team
description: Comprehensive customer data aggregation and insights platform. Unify customer data from all touchpoints to create actionable 360-degree customer profiles.
longDescription: The Customer 360 Stack provides a unified view of customer data by aggregating information from CRM, support systems, sales platforms, marketing tools, and social media. It delivers real-time insights, predictive analytics, and personalized recommendations to enhance customer experience and drive business growth.

useCases.title: Personalized Marketing
useCases.description: Create highly targeted campaigns based on comprehensive customer profiles and behavioral patterns.

useCases.title: Proactive Customer Service
useCases.description: Anticipate customer needs and issues before they arise using predictive analytics.

useCases.title: Sales Intelligence
useCases.description: Equip sales teams with complete customer context for more effective conversations.

useCases.title: Churn Prevention
useCases.description: Identify at-risk customers early and implement targeted retention strategies.

components.name: customer_360_agent.py
components.description: Core agent for aggregating and analyzing customer data from multiple sources

architecture.dataFlow: Source Systems → Data Lake → Processing → Analytics → API

security.encryption: AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit
